1.title: Start
1.plot: A family buries a body in the woods, and pretends that nothing happened the next day.

2.title: Smoked
2.plot: Missy refuses to go to school, and forces Molly to let her stay home. Dolores, a nosy neighbor, comes over to complain about cigarette butts on her lawn.

3.title: Accused
3.plot: Henry represents a Detective, in court, who has been accused of planting evidence at a crime scene.

4.title: Threat
4.plot: Missy hangs out with a boy named Aaron while Molly continues searching for her. Henry finds something surprising at the house.

5.title: Judgment
5.plot: Henry confronts Molly about Jennifer's death after the surprising discovery on their front door. Detective Elliot attempts to get Molly to tell her who killed Jennifer.

6.title: Guilt
6.plot: In 1995, Molly makes a tough decision about Jennifer. Meanwhile, in 2012, Dolores returns with more evidence about the mysterious neighborhood smoker. Molly receives something disturbing in the mail.

7.title: Disturbance
7.plot: In 1995, Molly meets Henry for the first time. In 2012, Molly deals with what was sent to her.

8.title: Decisions
8.plot: In 1995, Henry and Molly discuss their lives in the park. In 2012, Molly and the children prepare to leave to visit Aunt Trudy. Coco, the family dog, goes missing.

9.title: Searching
9.plot: In 1995, Molly visits Jennifer in jail. In 2012, Molly continues searching for Coco.

10.title: Biological
10.plot: In 1995, Molly brings Henry to her apartment for the first time. In 2012, Henry meets up with Molly as they continue searching for Coco. Missy confronts Molly about the pink box.

11.title: Confrontation
11.plot: In 1996, Henry receives his results from his bar exam. However, he has some surprising news for Molly. In 2012, Missy confronts Molly about who Jennifer really was. Henry contemplates telling someone else about the murder.

12.title: Unburied
12.plot: In 1996, Henry proposes to Molly. In 2012, Henry decided to tell an old detective friend about what is happening in hopes she can help. In 2044, Molly reveals something surprising to Detective Elliot. The Solloway Family get a surprise visitor.

1.title: Return
1.plot: In 2011, Molly is shocked to find Jennifer at her front door after not seeing her for twenty years. Meanwhile, in 2012, Henry, Molly, and Ellison deal with Connor's disappearance. In 2044, the District Attorney visits Elliot and the detectives for updates on Molly's interrogation.

2.title: Agitation
2.plot: In 2011, Henry introduced Jennifer to the rest of the family. In 2012, Henry continues to look for Connor while Molly and Ellison return home. In 2044, Elliot continues interrogating Molly. Meanwhile, someone in the department is unhappy with Molly's sudden confession.

3.title: Repugnance
3.plot: Molly and Ellison must retrieve the cigarette butts from Dolores. In 2044, Ellison recruits an officer to secretly investigate Molly's case for her. Detective Elliot connects Henry's death to a dirty medical examiner.

4.title: Discovery
4.plot: In 2011, Molly and Henry discuss Jennifer's visit. In 2012, Aaron tries to get Connor to tell them who killed Jennifer. Missy works with a sketch artist to identify Aaron. In 2044, Officer Randal Holmes arrives to help the other detectives. A surprising relationship is discovered.

5.title: Betrayed
5.plot: In 1996, Jennifer deals with the aftermath of her mother abandoning her. In 2044, new information contradicts Molly's story leaving the detectives confused. Meanwhile, Waller questions Ellison about her relationship to Molly.

6.title: Doubt
6.plot: In 2012, Molly finds out where Aaron could be living. Henry and Ellison identify Aaron and search for his brother, Davis. In 2044, Elliot challenges Molly doubting her entire story. Molly makes a surprising decision.

7.title: Leak
7.plot: In 2011, Molly deals with a plumbing issue. In 2012, Dolores arrives to check in on Molly. Meanwhile, Ellison and Henry continue their search for Aaron. In 2044, Elliot takes a break from the interrogation and begins investigating someone else.

8.title: Chase
8.plot: In 2011, Jennifer hatches a plan to get back at her mother. Meanwhile, in 2012, Molly & Henry attempt to get into Davis' apartment to try and find Connor. Ellison chases after Aaron's car. In 2044, Elliot investigates Officer Randal Holmes. Molly's lawyer arrives.

9.title: Realization
9.plot: In 2012, Molly & Henry are worried about the fate of their son when they find something disturbing in Davis' bathroom. Meanwhile, Ellison learns something surprising from Aaron. In 2044, Elliot continues to dig deeper into Officer Holmes.

10.title: Unhinged
10.plot: The day of Jennifer's death, Henry attempts to get her to leave Molly alone. Meanwhile, in 2012, Ellison confronts Molly and Henry. In 2044, D.A. Waller talks to the agent in charge of Dr. Chemmon's case. Elliot confronts Ellison.

11.title: Torment
11.plot: Jennifer convinces Aaron to let her go after her mother. Meanwhile, in present day, Ellison confronts Molly and Henry about the death of Jennifer. In 2044, Molly is arrested for the murder of Jennifer. Elliot confronts Ellison.

12.title: Murderer
12.plot: Jennifer confronts Molly moments before her death. D.A. Waller interviews Dr. Chemmon about information on Henry's death. Jennifer's murderer is revealed.

13.title: Death
13.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

1.title: Stop
1.plot: Molly deals with the aftermath of Henry's death. In 2044, Elliot holds Ellison at gunpoint.

2.title: Cheers
2.plot: In 1996, Ellison confronts Henry about his notes. In 2012, Molly says goodbye to Henry's body before Ellison takes it away. Meanwhile, in 2044, Elliot confides in Waller for help. Officer Randal demands answers.

3.title: Indulge
3.plot: In 1996, Ellison and Henry have a fight. In 2012, Molly returns to Trudy's house unsure of what to do. In 2044, Ellison asks Officer Randal for one more important favor.

4.title: Gone
4.plot: In 1996, Henry breaks up with Ellison. Meanwhile, in 2012, Ellison brings Dr. Chemmon Henry's body. In 2044, Ellison persuades D.A. Waller to hand over the tape recorder. Molly goes missing.

5.title: Understanding
5.plot: In 1996, Officer Ellison begins an investigation into the identity of Molly Gray. In 2012, Missy finds something shocking in a nearby playground. In 2044, the detective begin searching for Molly after she disappeared. Elliot is sent home.

6.title: Trust
6.plot: In 2012, Molly meets Missy at the police station and visits Henry in the morgue. In 2044, Elliot fears the worst when she finds the front door of her apartment left open. Meanwhile, D.A. Waller accuses A.D.A Kinger for being Ellison's mole.

7.title: Undercover
7.plot: In 1996, Ellison must choose her career or risk it all to continue stalking Henry and Molly. Meanwhile, in 2012, Missy reveals a shocking surprise to Molly. Trudy tries to convince Connor to tell her what's wrong. In 2044, Elliot seeks help from an old friend to find Molly on her own. A detective reveals she's undercover.

8.title: Encounter
8.plot: In 2043, Jennifer's body is found. In 2012, Molly confronts Missy for clear answers on what happened. Trudy learns the fate of her brother. In 2044, Elliot and Maretto begin tracking Ellison. Ellison brings Molly to a church to meet up with two unexpected people.

9.title: Trade
9.plot: A week before Henry's death, Henry gets a text from Ellison. In 2012, Trudy confronts Molly about Henry. In 2044, Ellison trades Molly for a gun. Someone is shot.

10.title: Kiss
10.plot: A week before Henry's death, Ellison tries to convince Henry to include her in his life again. Meanwhile, in 2012, Molly leaves to find Missy. In 2044, Elliot and Maretto continue investigating Ellison. The detectives arrive at the church crime scene. Officer Holmes makes a shocking realization.

11.title: Killed
11.plot: The day before Henry's death, Ellison tries to convince him to leave Molly for her. He recruits Detective Hunt to help him. Meanwhile, in 2012, Molly returns to the Solloway house since her husband's murder. In 2044, Elliot leaves to investigate a lead. Molly, Connor, and Missy go to a safe house after the shooting. Officer Holmes confronts Ellison.

12.title: Investigate
12.plot: 15 minutes before Henry's death, Ellison reveals to Molly that Henry was unfaithful to her. Meanwhile, in 2044, the detectives investigate the crime scene after Officer Holmes' death. Elliot receives some surprising information from Detective Hunt's sister.

13.title: Hostage
13.plot: Minutes before Henry's death, Ellison begs Henry to runaway with him. In 2044, Molly learns more about Connor's plan. Meanwhile, Elliot decides to finally confront Ellison once and for all.

14.title: Church
14.plot: In 2014, Young Christina Elliot goes to the police about her missing friend, Carrie. Meanwhile, Detective Ellison may have ties to a church full of dark secrets.

15.title: Answers
15.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

16.title: Acceptance
16.plot: In 2012, Molly begs Ellison for help in finding her family. Meanwhile, in 2044, the detectives find Ellison at her house. Elliot asks Molly to complete her "story". Henry's murderer is revealed.

1.title: Sideways
1.plot: In 2043, after a massive shooting at the Boston North Police Station, Detective Elliot learns the fate of her husband. Meanwhile, in 2012, Ellison attends a local church to help her cope with Henry's death.

2.title: Missing
2.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

3.title: Underneath
3.plot: In 2014, Detective Ellison asks Mother Turner for help in tracking down Father Hamblin. In 2045, Agent Cable continues to press Detective Elliot for information.

4.title: Haunted
4.plot: Agent Cable continues to push Elliot for answers. Meanwhile, in 2014, Ellison stops Hamblin from attacking Carrie.

5.title: Help
5.plot: Detective Elliot seeks out D.A. Cheryl Waller for help after she finds some factual inconsistencies with her husband and Rebecca Ellison. Meanwhile, Father Hamblin asks Ellison with help in keeping Carrie a secret for a little while longer.

6.title: Run
6.plot: Rebecca Ellison tries to figure out exactly what Father Hamblin is up to with Carrie. Meanwhile, in 2045, Elliot escapes from the interrogation room.

7.title: Surprise
7.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

8.title: Alive
8.plot: Ellison and Hamblin make a tough decision about how to deal with Carrie's body. Meanwhile, in 2045, Elliot is flabbergasted by who she finds in Room 2N and cannot decide how to continue.

imdb.title: Family Problems
plot: A family secretly buries a body in the woods and tries to live their life. However, dark secrets from the past arise and their plan of living a normal life soon becomes impossible.::Angelwood Pictures
